title: Outdoor Entertainment Gear - Outdoor Screen
description: Check out this video of the Outdoor Entertainment Gear Outdoor Screen.  From the carry bag to full assembled, this video walks you through it all.  If you've ever had questions about how big it is set and what it looks like, then this is your video.
